name: DevOps / Release Engineer
description:
Our team is looking for experienced engineers to implement a many challenging tasks in order to reduce time-to-market and make the lives of our software developers happier. Our ultimate goal is to make the perfect solution for deploying and skeletonizing services.

What you will do:

• Write your own common-pipeline so that any developer can bring his project to production through all development environments with a couple of code lines

• Interact with information security, we want our code to be secure

• Work responsibly on maintaining all code (stored in gitlab)

• Develop processes that any developer will follow to release the code of their product / service

• Troubleshooting of release / revert processes

• Provide technical support to developers

What's interesting:

• Freedom in decision making

• A wide range of tasks related directly to the CI/CD processes

• We love automation and want everything ran by buttons / bots and other helping things

• Experienced engineering team from leading IT product companies

• What we use: gitlab-ci, Kubernetes, GoLang, .Core, Java, Postgresql

• We are building multi-data centers architecture

What we expect from the candidate:

• Ability to write not only in bash (ideally python and / or golang)

• Basic knowledge of Linux

• Good knowledge of GitLab-CI (it is possible to change CI, but it will not be the easiest process)

• Basic knowledge in k8s, understanding of deployment processes in Kubernetes

• Know how to monitor processes and document them

What we offer:

• Work in the largest global player in the E-Commerce market

• Strong engineering team

• We do many processes and services "from scratch", there is an opportunity to bring best practice from the start

• Flexible working hours, MacBookPro 16 as a standard, annual bonus, medical insurance from the first days of work (includes 100% coverage for children)
